Compiz?: system-->preferences-->appearance--->visual effects tab ---> set something other than none. It requires hardware acceleration
is your video card capable? May need to get the restricted drivers for it. If you selected extra setting, and it stuck, restart X and see if you can get it going then
When you get cube checked and such.. don't forget to go into general option and add a few desktops (horizontal = 3 or more) else 'cuce' is pretty boring
